org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.join

Class CompositeRecordReader<K extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<?>,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,X extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.RecordReader<K,V>
      • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.join.ComposableRecordReader<K,X>
        • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.join.CompositeRecordReader<K,V,X>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Comparable<ComposableRecordReader<K,?>>, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JoinRecordReader, MultiFilterRecordReader

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
@InterfaceStability.Stable
public abstract class CompositeRecordReader<K extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<?>,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,X extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends ComposableRecordReader<K,X>
implements org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable
    A RecordReader that can effect joins of RecordReaders sharing a common key type and partitioning.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CompositeRecordReader.JoinCollector
      Collector for join values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CompositeRecordReader

        public CompositeRecordReader(int id,
                     int capacity,
                     Class<? extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparator> cmpcl)
                      throws IOException
        Create a RecordReader with capacity children to position id in the parent reader. The id of a root CompositeRecordReader is -1 by convention, but relying on this is not recommended.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • add

        public void add(ComposableRecordReader<K,? extends V> rr)
         throws IOException,
                InterruptedException
        Add a RecordReader to this collection. The id() of a RecordReader determines where in the Tuple its entry will appear. Adding RecordReaders with the same id has undefined behavior.
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException
